00001 #include <keyer.h>

00003 //========================================================================
00004 
00005 /* Read a straight key connected to a serial port, do debouncing, then
00006    return the key state */
00007 
00008 BOOLEAN read_straight_key( KeyerState ks, BOOLEAN keyed )
00009 {
00010     int i,
00011         j;
00012     static BOOLEAN keystate = 0;
00013     static int debounce_buf_i = 0,
00014         debounce_buf[DEBOUNCE_BUF_MAX_SIZE];
00015 
00016     debounce_buf[debounce_buf_i] = keyed;
00017     debounce_buf_i++;
00018 
00019     //
00020     //***************************************************
00021     // back to business as usual
00022     //***************************************************
00023 
00024     /* If the debounce buffer is full, determine the state of the key */
00025     if ( debounce_buf_i >= ks->debounce )
00026     {
00027         debounce_buf_i = 0;
00028 
00029         j = 0;
00030         for ( i = 0; i < ks->debounce; i++ )
00031             if ( debounce_buf[i] )
00032                 j++;
00033         keystate = ( j > ks->debounce / 2 ) ? 1 : 0;
00034     }
00035 
00036     return keystate;
00037 }
00038 
00039 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 
00041 /* Read an iambic key connected to a serial port, do debouncing, emulate a
00042    straight key, then return the emulated key state */
00043 
00044 BOOLEAN read_iambic_key( KeyerState ks, BOOLEAN dash, BOOLEAN dot,
00045                          KeyerLogic kl, REAL ticklen )
00046 {
00047     int i,
00048         j;
00049     static BOOLEAN dah_debounce_buf[DEBOUNCE_BUF_MAX_SIZE],
00050             dit_debounce_buf[DEBOUNCE_BUF_MAX_SIZE];
00051     static int dah = 0,
00052         debounce_buf_i = 0,
00053         dit = 0;
00054 
00055     if ( ks->flag.revpdl )
00056     {
00057         dah_debounce_buf[debounce_buf_i] = dot;
00058         dit_debounce_buf[debounce_buf_i] = dash;
00059     }
00060     else
00061     {
00062         dah_debounce_buf[debounce_buf_i] = dash;
00063         dit_debounce_buf[debounce_buf_i] = dot;
00064     }
00065     debounce_buf_i++;
00066 
00067     //
00068     //***************************************************
00069     // back to business as usual
00070     //***************************************************
00071 
00072     /* If the debounce buffer is full, determine the state of the keys */
00073     if ( debounce_buf_i >= ks->debounce )
00074     {
00075         debounce_buf_i = 0;
00076 
00077         j = 0;
00078         for ( i = 0; i < ks->debounce; i++ )
00079             if ( dah_debounce_buf[i] )
00080                 j++;
00081         dah = ( j > ks->debounce / 2 ) ? 1 : 0;
00082 
00083         j = 0;
00084         for ( i = 0; i < ks->debounce; i++ )
00085             if ( dit_debounce_buf[i] )
00086                 j++;
00087         dit = ( j > ks->debounce / 2 ) ? 1 : 0;
00088     }
00089 
00090     return klogic( kl, dit, dah, ks->wpm, ks->mode, ks->flag.mdlmdB,
00091                    ks->flag.memory.dit, ks->flag.memory.dah,
00092                    ks->flag.autospace.khar, ks->flag.autospace.word,
00093                    ks->weight, ticklen );
00094 }
